name: Wildfire (itch) (Ryan Lewis)
description:
You fly an AirTanker to help slow the spread of the fire. Use the Arrow Keys to turn & Hold Space to dump water that suppresses and block the wildfire's path.

Fly in big circles around the flame, and use Space Bar to create barriers that the fire can't jump over. The GameOver Screen was incomplete so fly around at your heart's content.

Wasn't able to finish this year. Goal was to have the player balancing a water resource while trying to draw circles around the fire to prevent spread. Needs completed scoring loop and more clear UI.
